From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>

** Dinobot had growled as he had heard yet another insult upon their 
commander which only now stood a few feet away from his current position.
The Maximals was making open challenges and if he were in command he would 
already have Angel Prime's throat slit and be standing over his spasming 
carcass. But that was just him. And his mind toyed with the possibilities 
that perhaps IronRaptor was weak in a warrior's light but clever in that of 
intelligence. Which was more of the way of winning a war and defeating an 
enemy then brute strength was. Through the years he had learned that little 
tid bit the hard way and on his old body he had worn the scars of it.
Dinobot shifted his weight slightly as he waited there along with the 
remainder of the Maximals which had come at the commanders call, feeling 
slightly out of place with the thought that it was all a waste of time and 
urging to be in the deftness of battle again. So indulged with the greed to 
get into the fight again, he had hardly noticed that Tavatron had made her 
way silently over to him and now stood beside. Though his attention was 
drawn to her once her voice was registered to him, catching just faintly 
what she said. A growl forming on his voice the moment he opened his maw. **
" This battle was lost the moment the gestalts formed." ** his optics always 
remained on the battlefield and then enemy.** " The only reaction remaining 
now is to depart. There is nothing left here." ** Dinobot had heard Tavatron 
mention something about other wounded bots but that was worth less then a 
single bite of memory from his mental systems. Fore, he was not a team 
player and the deaths of the Maximals were none of his concern. All were 
null except for one, Tavatron.
Already he could smell the stench of fresh mech-fluid dripping from her 
wounds, his already clotted. Since his repair his systems were functioning 
much faster. But Tavatron would need repairs, though none of the wounds 
seemed serious. **
